header: Judah Has Broken the Lord’s Agreement

verse: The Lord God told me to say to the people of Judah and Jerusalem:
Then the Lord told me to say to everyone on the streets of Jerusalem and in the towns of Judah:
Then the Lord told me to say to the people of Judah:

I am the Lord All-Powerful. You people of Judah were like a tree that I had planted, but you have made me angry by offering sacrifices to Baal, just as the northern kingdom did. And now I’m going to pull you up by the roots.
